Name: Plow
Description: Rake one hero card on your partner's field.

Name: Trim Back
Description:
Remove 1 ⏳ from one duration.
Deal 2 damage to one enemy.

Name: Scatter Seeds
Description:
Remove 1 ⏳ from one duration.
If there are eight or more hero cards on your field, deal 1 damage to each enemy.

Name: Till the Soil
Description:
Recover 3 vitality.
Rake one hero card on your partner's field.

Name: Mulch
Description: Blank up to two encounter cards until tomorrow.
